MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event GiveFeedback As GiveFeedbackEventHandler

summary.span: 在执行拖动操作期间发生。

span.span: Occurs during a drag operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 启动拖放操作时引发事件。The event is raised when a drag-and-drop operation is started. 使用事件，拖动事件的源可以修改鼠标指针的外观，以便在拖放操作过程中为提供用户可视反馈。With the event, the source of a drag event can modify the appearance of the mouse pointer in order to give the user visual feedback during a drag-and-drop operation. 下面描述与拖放操作相关的事件的引发方式以及引发时间。The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised. 方法确定当前游标位置下的控件。The method determines the control under the current cursor location. 然后检查以查看该控件是否有效的放置目标。It then checks to see if the control is a valid drop target. 如果控件是有效的放置目标，指定的拖放效果引发事件。If the control is a valid drop target, the event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified. 有关拖放效果的列表，请参见 枚举。For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the enumeration. 跟踪鼠标光标位置、键盘状态和鼠标按钮状态的更改。Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked. - 如果用户移出一个窗口，则引发 事件。If the user moves out of a window, the event is raised. - 如果鼠标进入另一个控件，则引发该控件的 。If the mouse enters another control, the for that control is raised. - 如果鼠标移动但停留在同一个控件中，则引发 事件。If the mouse moves but stays within the same control, the event is raised. 如果键盘或鼠标按钮状态，更改事件引发，并确定是否继续拖动、 放置数据，或取消操作值的基础属性的事件的。If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the property of the event's . - 如果的值是`Continue`，则引发事件以继续操作并事件以产生新效果，从而可以设置适当的可视反馈。If the value of is `Continue`, the event is raised to continue the operation and the event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set. 有关有效放置效果的列表，请参见 枚举。For a list of valid drop effects, see the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 和事件成对发生，以便当鼠标移到放置目标时，用户提供的最新反馈有关鼠标的位置。The and events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position. - 如果的值是`Drop`，则放置效果值将返回到源，以便源应用程序可以执行相应的操作对源数据中; 例如，如果则剪切数据是移动操作。If the value of is `Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move. - 如果的值是`Cancel`，则引发事件。If the value of is `Cancel`, the event is raised. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了两个之间拖放操作控件。The following code example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 此示例调用当拖动操作开始时的方法。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果已移动鼠标拖动操作启动多个鼠标位置在从事件。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用于确定要在拖动的项的索引`MouseDown`事件。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 示例还演示如何使用自定义光标拖放操作。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 该示例需要两个光标文件`3dwarro.cur`和`3dwno.cur`、 存在于应用程序目录，用于自定义拖动和不可拖动光标，分别。The example requires that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 如果将使用自定义光标`UseCustomCursorsCheck`检查。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 在中设置自定义光标事件处理程序。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 键盘状态进行评估事件处理程序的权利`ListBox`，以确定拖动操作将为基于 SHIFT、 CTRL、 ALT 或 CTRL + ALT 键的状态。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based on state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 中的位置`ListBox`期间还确定发生下拉`DragOver`事件。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果要删除的数据不是`String`，则设置为`None`中。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to `None` in . 最后，在显示状态的下拉`DropLocationLabel` 。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 若要删除的权利的数据`ListBox`在中确定事件处理程序和`String`值中的适当位置添加`ListBox`。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果拖动操作移动边界以外的窗体，则在取消拖放操作事件处理程序。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 这段代码摘录演示了如何使用事件。This code excerpt demonstrates using the event. 请参阅完整的代码示例的方法。See the method for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event GotFocus As EventHandler

summary.span: 在控件接收焦点时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control receives focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将焦点更改通过使用键盘 （TAB、 SHIFT + TAB，等），通过调用或方法，或通过设置到当前窗体的属性，将按以下顺序发生焦点事件：When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the or methods, or by setting the property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 当更改焦点，使用鼠标或通过调用方法时，按以下顺序执行的焦点事件：When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the method, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 如果属性设置为`false`，则和所抑制的事件。If the property is set to `false`, the and events are suppressed. **请注意**和事件是绑定到的 WM_KILLFOCUS 和 WM_SETFOCUS Windows 消息的低级别的焦点事件。**Note** The and events are low-level focus events that are tied to the WM_KILLFOCUS and WM_SETFOCUS Windows messages. 通常情况下，并更新时仅使用事件或编写自定义控件时。Typically, the and events are only used when updating or when writing custom controls. 相反和事件应使用的所有控件除了类，使用和事件。Instead the and events should be used for all controls except the class, which uses the and events. 有关详细信息并事件，请参阅[WM_SETFOCUS](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646283\(v=vs.85\).aspx)并[WM_KILLFOCUS](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx)主题。For more information about the and events, see the [WM_SETFOCUS](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646283\(v=vs.85\).aspx) and [WM_KILLFOCUS](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx) topics. > [!CAUTION] > 不尝试将焦点设置在， ， ， ， ，或事件处理程序。Do not attempt to set focus from within the , , , , , or event handlers. 执行此操作可能会导致你的应用程序或操作系统停止响应。Doing so can cause your application or the operating system to stop responding. 有关详细信息，请参阅[WM_KILLFOCUS](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx)主题。For more information, see the [WM_KILLFOCUS](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx) topic. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含继承的类型的实例的项目，如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后该实例命名`Control1`，并确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当创建句柄显示第一次。A handle is created when the is displayed for the first time. 例如，如果将创建一个具有设置为`false`，则之前将不会引发事件设置为`true`。For example, if a is created that has set to `false`, the event will not be raised until is set to `true`. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含继承的类型的实例的项目，如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后该实例命名`Control1`，并确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 期间事件，该控件仍是有效的 Windows 控件和可以通过调用重新创建方法。During the event, the control is still a valid Windows control and the can be recreated by calling the method. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含继承的类型的实例的项目，如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后该实例命名`Control1`，并确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示控件是否包含一个或多个子控件。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the control contains one or more child controls.

value.span: 如果控件包含一个或多个子控件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control contains one or more child controls; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果集合中存在大于零，属性将返回`true`。If the collection has a greater than zero, the property will return `true`. 访问属性不会强制创建如果控件没有任何子级，因此引用此属性可以提高性能时提供的控件树的每个步骤。Accessing the property does not force the creation of a if the control has no children, so referencing this property can provide a performance benefit when walking a tree of controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置和的默认系统颜色的控件。The following code example sets the and of the controls to the default system colors. 如果控件具有任何子控件，则代码以递归方式调用自身。The code recursively calls itself if the control has any child controls. 此代码示例，则需要与至少一个子控件; 但是，在子容器控件，如或，具有其自己的子控件包装会更好地演示递归。This code example requires that you have a with at least one child control; however, a child container control, like a or , with its own child control(s) would better demonstrate the recursion. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CPP/controlproperties.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CS/controlproperties.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/VB/controlproperties.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置控件的高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height of the control.

value.span: 控件的高度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The height of the control in pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对所做更改并属性值将导致要更改的控件的属性值。Changes made to the and property values cause the property value of the control to change. > [!NOTE] > 派生的控件的最小高度是一个像素。The minimum height for the derived control is one pixel. 默认高度控件是三个像素。The default height for the control is three pixels. 高度设控制对一个值，不会早于其中一个将属性值重置为默认高度。Setting the height of the control to a value less than one will reset the property value to the default height. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建三个窗体上并使用各种大小相关以及与位置相关属性来设置其大小和位置。The following code example creates three controls on a form and sets their size and location by using the various size-related and location-related properties. 此示例中，你需要具有具有宽度和高度至少为 300 像素。This example requires that you have a that has a width and height of at least 300 pixels. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control SizeLocation#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control SizeLocation/CPP/controlsizelocation.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control SizeLocation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control SizeLocation/CS/controlsizelocation.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control SizeLocation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control SizeLocation/VB/controlsizelocation.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event HelpRequested As HelpEventHandler

summary.span: 用户请求控件帮助时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user requests help for a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常当用户按 F1 键或关联的上下文相关帮助按钮单击。The event is commonly raised when the user presses the F1 key or an associated context-sensitive help button is clicked. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何处理事件，以包含四个地址字段的窗体上显示自定义帮助内容。The following code example demonstrates handling the event to display custom Help content on a form containing four address fields. 通过按 F1 键中的地址字段中，选中或通过使用上下文相关帮助按钮并单击帮助光标地址字段上的引发事件。The event is raised either by pressing the F1 key with the focus in an address field, or by the using the context-sensitive Help button and clicking the Help cursor on an address field. 属性设置为 true 以指示`HelpRequested`处理事件。The property is set to true to indicate that the `HelpRequested` event is handled. 该示例还演示了存储中的帮助文本属性。The example also demonstrates storing the Help text in the property. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler/CPP/helpevent.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler/CS/helpevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler/VB/helpevent.vb#1)]

span.span: Conceals the control from the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 隐藏控件等效于设置属性设置为`false`。Hiding the control is equivalent to setting the property to `false`. 之后调用方法时，属性返回的值`false`直到调用方法。After the method is called, the property returns a value of `false` until the method is called. ## Examples 下面的代码示例会隐藏按钮，如果单击该按钮按下 CTRL 键。The following code example hides a button if the CTRL key is pressed when the button is clicked. 此示例要求具有名为`button1`上。This example requires that you have a named `button1` on a . summary.span: 获取或设置控件的输入法编辑器 (IME) 模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the Input Method Editor (IME) mode of the control.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks IME 是一个程序，使用户能够输入复杂字符和符号，如日本汉字字符，使用标准键盘。An IME is a program that enables users to enter complex characters and symbols, such as Japanese Kanji characters, using a standard keyboard. 属性通常设置为为旨在只输入数字值的控件。The property is typically set to for a control that is intended to only enter numeric values. 属性值设置为为类。The property value is set to for the class. 大多数类不能直接支持输入法编辑器，或允许直接从 IME，输入将设置此属性设置为值。Most classes that do not directly support Input Method Editors, or allow direct input from an IME, will set the value of this property to . > [!IMPORTANT] > 用户可以以交互方式更改除非已以编程方式设置。The user can interactively change the unless it has been programmatically set to . 在这种情况下，用户将无法再使用 IME。In this case, the user will not be able to use the IME. > > 全局输入的模式，则将忽略在 Windows 8 上属性。The property is ignored on Windows 8 when the global input mode is in effect. 有关详细信息，请参阅[交换机文本输入从更改每个线程为每个用户](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=256509)。For more info, see [Switch Text Input Changed from Per-Thread to Per-User](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=256509).

exception.span: 所分配的值不是一个 枚举值。

span.span: The assigned value is not one of the enumeration values.

summary.span: 在 属性更改后发生。

span.span: Occurs when the property has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果引发此事件通过以编程方式修改或通过交互更改属性。This event is raised if the property is changed by either a programmatic modification or through interaction. 不支持输入法管理器的控件将永远不会引发此事件。Controls that do not support Input Method Managers will never raise this event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个事件处理程序时执行属性值发生更改。The following code example is an event handler that is executed when the property value changes. 类的一些方法具有名称模式*PropertyName* `Changed`的时引发的相应*PropertyName*值发生更改 (*PropertyName*表示相应的属性的名称)。The class has several methods with the name pattern *PropertyName*`Changed` that are raised when the corresponding *PropertyName* value changes (*PropertyName* represents the name of the corresponding property). 下面的代码示例中更改的显示货币数据。The following code example changes the of a displaying currency data. 此示例将文本转换为十进制数字，并更改到如果数字为负数和如果数字为正数。The example converts the text to a decimal number and changes the to if the number is negative and to if the number is positive. 此示例要求具有，其中包含。This example requires that you have a that contains a . [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control_PropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_PropertyChangedEvents/CPP/propertychangedevents.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control_PropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_PropertyChangedEvents/CS/propertychangedevents.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control_PropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_PropertyChangedEvents/VB/propertychangedevents.vb#1)]

summary.span: 在将控件添加到另一个容器之后调用。

span.span: Called after the control has been added to another container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将控件添加到容器后立即调用方法。The method is called immediately after adding a control to a container. 方法使控件基于其容器其布局状态初始化。The method enables a control to initialize its layout state based on its container. 例如，您通常会应用锚定和停靠到中的控件方法。For example, you would typically apply anchoring and docking to the control in the method.

para.span: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便正确显示控件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that the control is displayed correctly.

summary.span: 使控件的特定区域无效并向控件发送绘制消息。

span.span: Invalidates a specific region of the control and causes a paint message to be sent to the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Invalidate() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 使控件的整个图面无效并导致重绘控件。

span.span: Invalidates the entire surface of the control and causes the control to be redrawn.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法不会强制同步画图; 若要强制执行同步画图，请调用方法后调用方法。Calling the method does not force a synchronous paint; to force a synchronous paint, call the method after calling the method. 不带任何参数调用此方法时，将整个客户端区域添加到更新区域。When this method is called with no parameters, the entire client area is added to the update region. ## Examples 下面的代码示例启用删除用户后，将图像或图像文件拖到窗体，并将其显示在其上的点。The following code example enables the user to drag an image or image file onto the form, and have it be displayed at the point on it is dropped. 方法被重写重绘每次绘制窗体的图像; 否则该映像将仅持续到下一步重新绘制。The method is overridden to repaint the image each time the form is painted; otherwise the image would only persist until the next repainting. 事件处理方法确定要拖动到窗体数据的类型，并提供适当的反馈。The event-handling method determines the type of data being dragged into the form and provides the appropriate feedback. 事件处理方法在窗体上显示图像，如果可以从数据创建。The event-handling method displays the image on the form, if an can be created from the data. 因为并的值为屏幕坐标，该示例使用方法来将它们转换为客户端坐标。Because the and values are screen coordinates, the example uses the method to convert them to client coordinates. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations/CPP/imagedrag.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations/CS/imagedrag.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations/VB/imagedrag.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法不会强制同步画图; 若要强制执行同步画图，请调用方法后调用方法。Calling the method does not force a synchronous paint; to force a synchronous paint, call the method after calling the method. 不带任何参数调用此方法时，将整个客户端区域添加到更新区域。When this method is called with no parameters, the entire client area is added to the update region.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含继承的类型的实例的项目，如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后该实例命名`Control1`，并确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#40)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#40)]

summary.span: 在拥有此控件的基础窗口句柄的线程上执行指定的委托。

span.span: Executes the specified delegate on the thread that owns the control's underlying window handle.

returns.span: 正在被调用的委托的返回值，或者如果委托没有返回值，则为 。

span.span: The return value from the delegate being invoked, or if the delegate has no return value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 委托是类似于 C 或 c + + 语言中的函数指针。Delegates are similar to function pointers in C or C++ languages. 委托封装到委托对象中的方法的引用。Delegates encapsulate a reference to a method inside a delegate object. 委托对象然后传递到调用所引用的方法的代码，并且要调用的方法可以在编译时未知。The delegate object can then be passed to code that calls the referenced method, and the method to be invoked can be unknown at compile time. 与 C 或 c + + 中的函数指针，委托是面向对象的、 类型安全和更安全。Unlike function pointers in C or C++, delegates are object-oriented, type-safe, and more secure. 方法搜索控件的父链，直到它找到的控件或窗体具有一个窗口处理如果尚不存在当前控件的基础窗口句柄。The method searches up the control's parent chain until it finds a control or form that has a window handle if the current control's underlying window handle does not exist yet. 如果找不到任何合适的句柄，方法将引发异常。If no appropriate handle can be found, the method will throw an exception. 在调用期间引发的异常将传播回调用方。Exceptions that are raised during the call will be propagated back to the caller. > [!NOTE] > 除了属性，在控件上都是线程安全的四种方法： ， ， ，和如果已创建控件的句柄。In addition to the property, there are four methods on a control that are thread safe: , , , and if the handle for the control has already been created. 调用后台线程上创建控件的句柄之前可能会导致非法的跨线程调用。Calling before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls. 对于所有其他方法调用，您应使用 invoke 方法之一来封送对控件的线程的调用。For all other method calls, you should use one of the invoke methods to marshal the call to the control's thread. 委托可以是实例，在这种情况下发件人参数将包含此控件和事件参数将包含。The delegate can be an instance of , in which case the sender parameter will contain this control, and the event parameter will contain . 委托还可以是实例，或任何其他 void 参数列表的委托。The delegate can also be an instance of , or any other delegate that takes a void parameter list. 调用或委托会比其他类型的委托调用更快。A call to an or delegate will be faster than a call to another type of delegate. > [!NOTE] > 如果应处理该消息的线程不再处于活动状态，可能会引发异常。An exception might be thrown if the thread that should process the message is no longer active. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了包含一个委托的控件。The following code example shows controls that contain a delegate. 委托封装的方法将项添加到列表框中，并拥有的窗体的基础句柄的线程上执行此方法。The delegate encapsulates a method that adds items to the list box, and this method is executed on the thread that owns the underlying handle of the form. 当用户单击按钮，`Invoke`运行该委托。When the user clicks on the button, `Invoke` runs the delegate. [!code-cpp[Control_Invoke2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control_Invoke2/CPP/control_invoke2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control_Invoke2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control_Invoke2/CS/control_invoke2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control_Invoke2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control_Invoke2/VB/control_invoke2.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 委托是类似于 C 或 c + + 语言中的函数指针。Delegates are similar to function pointers in C or C++ languages. 委托封装到委托对象中的方法的引用。Delegates encapsulate a reference to a method inside a delegate object. 委托对象然后传递到调用所引用的方法的代码，并且要调用的方法可以在编译时未知。The delegate object can then be passed to code that calls the referenced method, and the method to be invoked can be unknown at compile time. 与 C 或 c + + 中的函数指针，委托是面向对象的、 类型安全和更安全。Unlike function pointers in C or C++, delegates are object-oriented, type-safe, and more secure. 如果控件的句柄尚不存在，此方法搜索控件的父链，直到它找到的控件或窗体具有一个窗口句柄。If the control's handle does not exist yet, this method searches up the control's parent chain until it finds a control or form that does have a window handle. 如果找不到任何合适的句柄，此方法将引发异常。If no appropriate handle can be found, this method throws an exception. 在调用期间引发的异常将传播回调用方。Exceptions that are raised during the call will be propagated back to the caller. > [!NOTE] > 除了属性，在控件上都是线程安全的四种方法： ， ， ，和如果已创建控件的句柄。In addition to the property, there are four methods on a control that are thread safe: , , , and if the handle for the control has already been created. 调用后台线程上创建控件的句柄之前可能会导致非法的跨线程调用。Calling before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls. 对于所有其他方法调用，您应使用 invoke 方法之一来封送对控件的线程的调用。For all other method calls, you should use one of the invoke methods to marshal the call to the control's thread. 委托可以是实例，在这种情况下发件人参数将包含此控件和事件参数将包含。The delegate can be an instance of , in which case the sender parameter will contain this control, and the event parameter will contain . 委托还可以是实例，或任何其他 void 参数列表的委托。The delegate can also be an instance of , or any other delegate that takes a void parameter list. 调用或委托会比其他类型的委托调用更快。A call to an or delegate will be faster than a call to another type of delegate. > [!NOTE] > 如果应处理该消息的线程不再处于活动状态，可能会引发异常。An exception might be thrown if the thread that should process the message is no longer active. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了包含一个委托的控件。The following code example shows controls that contain a delegate. 委托封装的方法将项添加到列表框中，并拥有的窗体中，使用指定的参数的基础句柄的线程上执行此方法。The delegate encapsulates a method that adds items to the list box, and this method is executed on the thread that owns the underlying handle of the form, using the specified arguments. 当用户单击按钮，`Invoke`运行该委托。When the user clicks on the button, `Invoke` runs the delegate. public: property bool InvokeRequired { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示调用方在对控件进行方法调用时是否必须调用 Invoke 方法，因为调用方位于创建控件所在的线程以外的线程中。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the caller must call an invoke method when making method calls to the control because the caller is on a different thread than the one the control was created on.

value.span: 如果控件的 是在与调用线程不同的线程上创建的（说明您必须通过 Invoke 方法对控件进行调用），则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control's was created on a different thread than the calling thread (indicating that you must make calls to the control through an invoke method); otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Windows 窗体控件绑定到特定线程并不是线程安全。Controls in Windows Forms are bound to a specific thread and are not thread safe. 因此，如果你正在从另一个线程调用控件的方法，您必须使用其中一个控件的调用封送到正确的线程调用的方法。Therefore, if you are calling a control's method from a different thread, you must use one of the control's invoke methods to marshal the call to the proper thread. 此属性可以用于确定是否必须调用 invoke 方法，如果您不知道在哪个线程拥有一个控件可能很有用。This property can be used to determine if you must call an invoke method, which can be useful if you do not know what thread owns a control. > [!NOTE] > 除了属性，在控件上都是线程安全地调用的四种方法： ，，和如果已创建控件的句柄。In addition to the property, there are four methods on a control that are thread safe to call: ,, and if the handle for the control has already been created. 调用后台线程上创建控件的句柄之前可能会导致非法的跨线程调用。Calling before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls. 对于所有其他方法调用，应使用其中一种从另一个线程调用时调用的方法。For all other method calls, you should use one of these invoke methods when calling from a different thread. 如果控件的句柄尚不存在，搜索控件的父沿着链向上，直到它找到的控件或窗体具有一个窗口句柄。If the control's handle does not yet exist, searches up the control's parent chain until it finds a control or form that does have a window handle. 如果找不到任何合适的句柄，方法将返回`false`。If no appropriate handle can be found, the method returns `false`. 这意味着可以返回`false`如果不是必需的 （调用发生在同一线程上），或如果在不同线程上创建该控件，但尚未创建控件的句柄。This means that can return `false` if is not required (the call occurs on the same thread), or if the control was created on a different thread but the control's handle has not yet been created. 在控件的句柄尚未创建的情况下，不应只需调用属性、 方法或事件在控件上。In the case where the control's handle has not yet been created, you should not simply call properties, methods, or events on the control. 这可能会导致在隔离没有消息泵线程上的控件并使应用程序不稳定的后台线程上创建控件的句柄。This might cause the control's handle to be created on the background thread, isolating the control on a thread without a message pump and making the application unstable. 你可以抵御这种情况下通过还检查的值时返回`false`后台线程上。You can protect against this case by also checking the value of when returns `false` on a background thread. 如果尚未创建控件句柄，必须等待，直到已创建，然后再调或。If the control handle has not yet been created, you must wait until it has been created before calling or . 通常情况下，会发生此情况仅在应用程序的主窗体的构造函数中创建后台线程 (如`Application.Run(new MainForm())`，然后显示窗体或`Application.Run`已调用。Typically, this happens only if a background thread is created in the constructor of the primary form for the application (as in `Application.Run(new MainForm())`, before the form has been shown or `Application.Run` has been called. 一种解决方案是等待，直到启动后台线程之前已创建窗体的句柄。One solution is to wait until the form's handle has been created before starting the background thread. 可以通过调用强制创建句柄属性，或者等待事件启动后台进程。Either force handle creation by calling the property, or wait until the event to start the background process. 更好的解决方案是使用`SynchronizationContext`返回的而不是用于跨线程封送处理的控件。An even better solution is to use the `SynchronizationContext` returned by rather than a control for cross-thread marshaling. > [!NOTE] > 如果应处理该消息的线程不再处于活动状态，可能会引发异常。An exception might be thrown if the thread that should process the message is no longer active. 有关多线程 Windows 窗体控件的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 使用后台线程搜索文件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-use-a-background-thread-to-search-for-files.md)并[如何： 对 Windows 窗体控件进行线程安全调用](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-make-thread-safe-calls-to-windows-forms-controls.md)。For more information about multithreaded Windows Forms controls, see [How to: Use a Background Thread to Search for Files](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-use-a-background-thread-to-search-for-files.md) and [How to: Make Thread-Safe Calls to Windows Forms Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-make-thread-safe-calls-to-windows-forms-controls.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性返回`true`，控件被释放，不能再作为有效的 Windows 控件被引用。When this property returns `true`, the control is disposed of and can no longer be referenced as a valid Windows control. 即使控件的实例已释放，它仍将保留在内存中直到从通过垃圾回收的内存中删除。Even though the instance of a control is disposed of, it is still maintained in memory until it is removed from memory through garbage collection. 当释放一个控件时，不能调用其方法。When a control is disposed, you cannot call its method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法，以确定指定的字符`charCode`参数是控件需要的输入的字符。Call the method to determine whether the character specified by the `charCode` parameter is an input character that the control wants. 在窗口消息预处理，以确定是否应经过预处理，或直接向控件发送指定的输入的字符期间调用此方法。This method is called during window message preprocessing to determine whether the specified input character should be preprocessed or sent directly to the control. 如果返回`true`，直接向控件发送指定的字符。If returns `true`, the specified character is sent directly to the control. 如果返回`false`，预处理过的和仅发送到控件，如果不使用时的预处理阶段指定的字符。If returns `false`, the specified character is preprocessed and only sent to the control if it is not consumed by the preprocessing phase. 字符的预处理包括检查的字符是否另一个控件的助记键。The preprocessing of a character includes checking whether the character is a mnemonic of another control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法，以确定指定的键是否`keyData`参数是控件需要一个输入的密钥。Call the method to determine whether the key specified by the `keyData` parameter is an input key that the control wants. 在窗口消息预处理，以确定是否应经过预处理，或直接向控件发送指定的输入的键期间调用此方法。This method is called during window message preprocessing to determine whether the specified input key should be preprocessed or sent directly to the control. 如果返回`true`，直接向控件发送指定的键。If returns `true`, the specified key is sent directly to the control. 如果返回`false`，指定的键是预处理过的如果不使用时的预处理阶段仅向控件发送。If returns `false`, the specified key is preprocessed and only sent to the control if it is not consumed by the preprocessing phase. 将预处理过的键包括选项卡、 返回、 ESC，和向上键、 向下箭头、 向左键和向右箭头键。Keys that are preprocessed include the TAB, RETURN, ESC, and the UP ARROW, DOWN ARROW, LEFT ARROW, and RIGHT ARROW keys. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法控件。The following code example shows you how to override the method for a control. 在此示例中，`TabTextBox`类处理 TAB 键。In this example, the `TabTextBox` class handles the TAB key. 当`TabTextBox`具有焦点并且用户按 TAB 键在文本插入点，添加四个空格替换为所选的任何文本。When the `TabTextBox` has the focus and the user presses the TAB key four spaces are added at the text insertion point, replacing any selected text. 默认情况下，控件通过将输入的焦点移动到下一个控件来处理 TAB 键。By default, the control handles the TAB key by moving the input focus to the next control. 在这种情况下，keypress 永远不会达到方法重写。In this case, the keypress never reaches the method override. 若要防止此默认行为，方法重写返回`true`当用户按 TAB 键。To prevent this default behavior, the method override returns `true` when the user presses the TAB key. 对于所有其他按键，方法重写将返回调用基类版本的方法的结果。For all other keypresses, the method override returns the result of calling the base-class version of the method. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey/cs/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey/vb/form1.vb#0)]

summary.span: 在控件有焦点的情况下按下键时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a key is pressed while the control has focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按以下顺序发生键事件：Key events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 若要仅在窗体级别处理键盘事件，而不允许其他控件可以接收键盘事件，将设置在窗体中的属性事件处理方法`true`。To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable other controls to receive keyboard events, set the property in your form's event-handling method to `true`. 自动由控件处理某些项，例如选项卡、 返回、 ESC、 和箭头键。Certain keys, such as the TAB, RETURN, ESC, and arrow keys are handled by controls automatically. 若要使这些键引发事件，必须重写窗体上的每个控件中的方法。To have these keys raise the event, you must override the method in each control on your form. 重写的代码需要确定按下了某个特殊键，并返回值为`true`。The code for the override of the would need to determine if one of the special keys is pressed and return a value of `true`. 而不是替代方法，可以处理事件并设置属性设置为`true`。Instead of overriding the method, you can handle the event and set the property to `true`. 有关代码示例，请参阅事件。For a code example, see the event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用事件来确定的字符输入到控件的类型。The following code example uses the event to determine the type of character entered into the control. [!code-cpp[Control.KeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyDown/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control.KeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyDown/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control.KeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyDown/VB/form1.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示了次幂的计算顺序， ，事件，以及如何注册其上的事件处理程序。The following code example demonstrates the order of raising the , , events, and how to register event handlers on them. [!code-csharp[Control.KeyDown#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyDown/CS/form2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control.KeyDown#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyDown/VB/Form2.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按以下顺序发生键事件：Key events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 以外的空间和退格符的非字符键不会引发事件; 但是，不要引发非字符键和事件。The event is not raised by non-character keys other than space and backspace; however, the non-character keys do raise the and events. 使用属性设置为示例的键击在运行时和使用或修改常见击键的子集。Use the property to sample keystrokes at run time and to consume or modify a subset of common keystrokes. 若要仅在窗体级别处理键盘事件，而不允许其他控件可以接收键盘事件，将设置在窗体中的属性事件处理方法`true`。To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable other controls to receive keyboard events, set the property in your form's event-handling method to `true`. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用事件，以防止字符从输入控件。The following code example uses the event to prevent characters from entering the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 按以下顺序发生键事件：Key events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 若要仅在窗体级别处理键盘事件，而不允许其他控件可以接收键盘事件，将设置在窗体中的属性事件处理方法`true`。To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable other controls to receive keyboard events, set the property in your form's event-handling method to `true`. 自动由控件处理某些项，例如选项卡、 返回、 ESC、 和箭头键。Certain keys, such as the TAB, RETURN, ESC, and arrow keys are handled by controls automatically. 若要使这些键引发事件，必须重写窗体上的每个控件中的方法。To have these keys raise the event, you must override the method in each control on your form. 重写的代码需要确定按下了某个特殊键，并返回值为`true`。The code for the override of would need to determine if one of the special keys is pressed and return a value of `true`. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用具有事件类，以显示给用户的弹出样式帮助。The following code example uses the event with the class to display pop-up style help to the user. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Layout As LayoutEventHandler

summary.span: 在控件应重新定位其子控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a control should reposition its child controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生时添加或删除，在指定边界内的控件更改和其他更改发生时可能会影响控件的布局时子控件。The event occurs when child controls are added or removed, when the bounds of the control changes, and when other changes occur that can affect the layout of the control. 布局事件可以使用抑制和方法。The layout event can be suppressed using the and methods. 挂起的布局，可在控件上执行多个操作，而无需执行一次布局的每个更改。Suspending layout enables you to perform multiple actions on a control without having to perform a layout for each change. 例如，如果您重设大小，并将一个控件移动，每个操作都会引发事件。For example, if you resize and move a control, each operation would raise a event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例中心在屏幕上事件。The following code example centers a on the screen in the event. 这将避免表单居中当用户调整其大小时。This will keep the form centered as the user resizes it. 此示例要求您已创建控件。This example requires that you have created a control. [!code-cpp[Control.Layout#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Layout/CPP/layout.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control.Layout#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Layout/CS/layout.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control.Layout#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Layout/VB/layout.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Leave As EventHandler

summary.span: 在输入焦点离开控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the input focus leaves the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将焦点更改通过使用键盘 （TAB、 SHIFT + TAB，等），通过调用或方法，或通过设置到当前窗体的属性，将按以下顺序发生焦点事件：When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the or methods, or by setting the property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 当更改焦点，使用鼠标或通过调用方法时，按以下顺序执行的焦点事件：When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the method, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 如果属性设置为`false`，则和所抑制的事件。If the property is set to `false`, the and events are suppressed. > [!NOTE] > 并事件所抑制的类。The and events are suppressed by the class. 中的等效事件类是和事件。The equivalent events in the class are the and events. 和事件层次结构，并将级联向上和向下父链直到达到相应的控件。The and events are hierarchical and will cascade up and down the parent chain until the appropriate control is reached. 例如，假设您有具有两个控件，并且每个控件有一个控件。For example, assume you have a with two controls, and each control has one control. 当从一个移动插入符号到其他用于引发事件和，并其他引发事件和。When the caret is moved from one to the other, the event is raised for the and , and the event is raised for the other and . > [!CAUTION] > 不尝试将焦点设置在， ， ， ， ，或事件处理程序。Do not attempt to set focus from within the , , , , , or event handlers. 执行此操作可能会导致你的应用程序或操作系统停止响应。Doing so can cause your application or the operating system to stop responding. 有关详细信息，请参阅[WM_KILLFOCUS](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx)主题。For more information, see the [WM_KILLFOCUS](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx) topic. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用事件以将控件重置为以前的状态。The following code example uses the event to reset a control to its former state. [!code-cpp[Control.Enter#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Enter/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control.Enter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Enter/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control.Enter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Enter/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性值等于属性的控件的属性值。The property value is equivalent to the property of the property value of the control. 对所做更改并属性值将导致要更改的控件的属性值。Changes made to the and property values cause the property value of the control to change. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建三个窗体上并使用各种大小相关以及与位置相关属性来设置其大小和位置。The following code example creates three controls on a form and sets their size and location by using the various size-related and location-related properties. 此示例中，你需要具有具有宽度和高度至少为 300 像素。This example requires that you have a that has a width and height of at least 300 pixels. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control SizeLocation#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control SizeLocation/CPP/controlsizelocation.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control SizeLocation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control SizeLocation/CS/controlsizelocation.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control SizeLocation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control SizeLocation/VB/controlsizelocation.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置该控件的左上角相对于其容器的左上角的坐标。

span.span: Gets or sets the coordinates of the upper-left corner of the control relative to the upper-left corner of its container.

value.span: ，表示控件的左上角相对于其容器的左上角。

span.span: The that represents the upper-left corner of the control relative to the upper-left corner of its container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为类是值类型 (`Structure`在 Visual Basic 中`struct`Visual C# 中)，它返回的值，这意味着访问的属性返回的控件的左上角点副本。Because the class is a value type (`Structure` in Visual Basic, `struct` in Visual C#), it is returned by value, meaning accessing the property returns a copy of the upper-left point of the control. 因此，调整或的属性返回此属性将不会影响， ， ，或控件的属性值。So, adjusting the or properties of the returned from this property will not affect the , , , or property values of the control. 若要调整这些属性分别设置每个属性值，或设置具有一个新属性。To adjust these properties set each property value individually, or set the property with a new . 如果是，则属性值表示的左上角屏幕坐标中。If the is a , the property value represents the upper-left corner of the in screen coordinates. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建和设置的某些常见属性。The following code example creates a and sets some of its common properties. 此示例将创建，并设置其组框中。The example creates a and sets its within the group box. 接下来，设置停靠此分组框到窗体顶部的分组框的属性。Next, it sets the property of the group box, and docks the group box to the top of the form. 最后，通过设置禁用分组框属性设置为`false`，这将导致要禁用的组框中包含的所有控件。Lastly, it disables the group box by setting the property to `false`, which causes all controls contained within the group box to be disabled. summary.span: 在控件失去焦点时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control loses focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将焦点更改通过使用键盘 （TAB、 SHIFT + TAB，等），通过调用或方法，或通过设置到当前窗体的属性，将按以下顺序发生焦点事件：When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the or methods, or by setting the property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 当更改焦点，使用鼠标或通过调用方法时，按以下顺序执行的焦点事件：When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the method, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 如果属性设置为`false`，则和所抑制的事件。If the property is set to `false`, the and events are suppressed. 如果的属性设置为`true`中事件委托，通常会发生后的所有事件所抑制的事件。If the property of the is set to `true` in the event delegate, all events that would usually occur after the event are suppressed. > [!NOTE] > 和事件是绑定到的 WM_KILLFOCUS 和 WM_SETFOCUS Windows 消息的低级别的焦点事件。The and events are low-level focus events that are tied to the WM_KILLFOCUS and WM_SETFOCUS Windows messages. 通常情况下，并更新时仅使用事件或编写自定义控件时。Typically, the and events are only used when updating or when writing custom controls. 相反和事件应使用的所有控件除了类，使用和事件。Instead the and events should be used for all controls except the class, which uses the and events. 有关详细信息并事件，请参阅[WM_KILLFOCUS](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx)并[WM_KILLFOCUS](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx)主题。For more information about the and events, see the [WM_KILLFOCUS](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx) and [WM_KILLFOCUS](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx) topics. > [!CAUTION] > 不尝试将焦点设置在， ， ， ， ，或事件处理程序。Do not attempt to set focus from within the , , , , , or event handlers. 执行此操作可能会导致你的应用程序或操作系统停止响应。Doing so can cause your application or the operating system to stop responding. 有关详细信息，请参阅[WM_KILLFOCUS](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx)主题。For more information, see the [WM_KILLFOCUS](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx) topic. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示为 TextBox1 验证的文本。The following code example demonstrates validating the text for TextBox1. 它还演示了如何处理通过设置事件TextBox1 中的文本的属性。It also demonstrates handling the event by setting the property to the text in TextBox1. 使用的代码示例方法来打开文件对话框之前检查错误。The code example used the method to check for an error before opening the file dialog box. 若要运行此示例中，请将以下代码粘贴到窗体包含名为`TextBox1`，则名为`OpenFileDialog1`即名为`Button1`，和一个名为`ErrorProvider1`。To run this example, paste the following code into a form containing a named `TextBox1`, an named `OpenFileDialog1`, a named `Button1`, and an named `ErrorProvider1`. 请确保所有事件都都具有其事件处理程序相关联。Ensure all events are associated with their event handlers. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MouseCaptureChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 当控件失去鼠标捕获时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control loses mouse capture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在极少数情况下，可能需要检测意外的输入。In rare scenarios, you might need to detect unexpected input. 例如，考虑以下方案。For example, consider the following scenarios. - 在鼠标操作中，用户通过按 Windows 键或 CTRL + ESC 打开开始菜单。During a mouse operation, the user opens the Start menu by pressing the Windows key or CTRL+ESC. - 在鼠标操作中，用户切换到另一个程序通过按 ALT + TAB。During a mouse operation, the user switches to another program by pressing ALT+TAB. - 在鼠标操作中，另一个程序显示一个窗口或一个消息框，焦点会离开当前应用程序。During a mouse operation, another program displays a window or a message box that takes focus away from the current application. 鼠标操作可以包括单击并将鼠标放在窗体或控件，或执行鼠标拖动操作。Mouse operations can include clicking and holding the mouse on a form or a control, or performing a mouse drag operation. 如果您有用于检测何时窗体或控件失去鼠标捕获这些相关的意外情况下，您可以使用事件。If you have to detect when a form or a control loses mouse capture for these and related unexpected scenarios, you can use the event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示事件控件。The following code example demonstrates the event for a control. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseCaptureChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.windows.forms.control.mousecapturechanged/cs/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseCaptureChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.windows.forms.control.mousecapturechanged/vb/form1.vb#1)] 若要测试此示例中，它在调试器中按 F5 运行。To test this example, run it in the debugger by pressing F5. 打开**输出**Visual Studio 窗口中的，以便您可以看到当引发事件。Open the **Output** window in Visual Studio so that you can see when events are raised. 单击并注意以下输出。Click the and notice the following output. `button1_MouseDown` `button1_MouseUp` `button1_MouseCaptureChanged` 现在，单击并按住鼠标左键控件。Now, click and hold the left mouse button on the control. 仍在单击鼠标，同时按 ALT + TAB 切换到另一个程序。While still clicking the mouse, press ALT+TAB to switch to another program. 请注意，使您能够处理这种情况可能会引发事件。Notice that the event is raised enabling you to potentially handle this scenario. 具体取决于你的操作，可能不会引发事件。Depending on your actions, the event might not be raised. 此外可以尝试此测试的 Windows 键或 CTRL + ESC。You can also try this test with the Windows key or CTRL+ESC. `button1_MouseDown` `button1_MouseCaptureChanged`

summary.span: 用鼠标单击控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control is clicked by the mouse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当光标通常位于控件上方时如果释放鼠标按钮会引发以下一系列控件中的事件：Depressing a mouse button when the cursor is over a control typically raises the following series of events from the control: 1. 事件。 event. 2. 事件。 event. 3. 事件。 event. 4. 事件。 event. 为此，各种事件不能禁用控件的类中。For this to occur, the various events cannot be disabled in the control's class. 两次单击足够时间，具体由用户的操作系统，鼠标设置确定将生成事件而不是第二个事件。Two single clicks that occur close enough in time, as determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system, will generate a event instead of the second event. > [!IMPORTANT] > 事件是逻辑上控件的事件。 events are logically higher-level events of a control. 它们通常会引发其他操作，例如，在控件有焦点时按 ENTER 键。They are often raised by other actions, such as pressing the ENTER key when the control has focus. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含继承的类型的实例的项目，如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后该实例命名`Control1`，并确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 时用户释放鼠标按钮两次连续快速地在光标位于控件上方时，发生事件。The event occurs when the user depresses a mouse button twice in quick succession when the cursor is over the control. 将两次单击与双击分隔开来的时间间隔是由用户的操作系统的鼠标设置确定。The time interval that separates two single clicks from a double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system. 这样的用户操作发生时，将由该控件引发以下一系列事件：The following series of events is raised by the control when such a user action takes place: 1. 事件。 event. 2. 事件。 event. 3. 事件。 event. 4. 事件。 event. 5. 事件。 event. 6. 事件。 event. 7. 事件。 event. 8. 事件。 event. 为此，各种事件不能禁用控件的类中。For this to occur, the various events cannot be disabled in the control's class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 事件是逻辑上控件的事件。 events are logically higher-level events of a control. 它们可能会引发由其他用户操作，例如快捷键组合。They may be raised by other user actions, such as shortcut key combinations. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含继承的类型的实例的项目，如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后该实例命名`Control1`，并确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 鼠标事件按下列顺序发生：Mouse events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. / / 4. 5. > [!NOTE] > 不会引发以下事件类，除非没有至少一个中集合： ， ， ， ， ， ，和。The following events are not raised for the class unless there is at least one in the collection: , , , , , , and . 如果没有至少一个在集合中，并在用户与选项卡控件的标头交互 (其中名称显示)，则引发相应事件。If there is at least one in the collection, and the user interacts with the tab control's header (where the names appear), the raises the appropriate event. 但是，如果在工作区内的选项卡页上，为用户交互引发相应事件。However, if the user interaction is within the client area of the tab page, the raises the appropriate event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用不同的鼠标事件上绘制的路径鼠标。The following code example demonstrates using different mouse events to draw the path of the mouse on a . 直线段添加到为每个和发生的事件。A line segment is added to the for each and events that occur. 要更新该图形的调用方法每个`MouseDown`和`MouseUp`事件。To update the graphics, the method is called for the on each `MouseDown` and `MouseUp` event. 此外，向上或向下时滚动的图形路径事件发生。In addition, the graphic path is scrolled up or down when the event occurs. 其他鼠标事件，例如，屏幕上进行标识。Additional mouse events, like , are identified on screen as well. 此外在屏幕上显示为鼠标从有关的其他信息类。Also displayed on the screen is additional information about the mouse from the class. summary.span: 获取鼠标光标的位置（以屏幕坐标表示）。

span.span: Gets the position of the mouse cursor in screen coordinates.

value.span: ，它包含鼠标光标相对于屏幕左上角的坐标。

span.span: A that contains the coordinates of the mouse cursor relative to the upper-left corner of the screen.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回在引用属性时的时间表示鼠标光标位置。The property returns a that represents the mouse cursor position at the time the property was referenced. 坐标指示的位置在屏幕上，不相对于控件，并且无论是否将光标悬停在控件返回。The coordinates indicate the position on the screen, not relative to the control, and are returned regardless of whether the cursor is positioned over the control. 在屏幕的左上角的坐标为 0，0。The coordinates of the upper-left corner of the screen are 0,0. 属性等同于属性。The property is identical to the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将到可编辑状态时在用户按 ALT + E，鼠标光标位于树节点标签。The following code example puts a label into an editable state when the user presses ALT+E while the mouse cursor is over the tree node. 用户完成操作后编辑标签，标签之前，无法编辑再次再次按下 ALT + E 键组合。After the user is done editing the label, the labels cannot be edited again until the ALT+E key combination is pressed again. 此示例要求具有上。This example requires that you have a on a . 在树视图还应具有至少一个在其集合。The tree view should also have at least one in its collection. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MouseWheel As MouseEventHandler

summary.span: 在控件有焦点且鼠标轮移动时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the mouse wheel moves while the control has focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在处理时务必遵循与鼠标滚轮相关联的用户界面 (UI) 标准的事件。When handling the event it is important to follow the user interface (UI) standards associated with the mouse wheel. 属性值指示移动量鼠标滚轮。The property value indicates the amount the mouse wheel has been moved. UI 应滚动时累积的增量是加上或减去 120。The UI should scroll when the accumulated delta is plus or minus 120. UI 应滚动逻辑返回的行数达到每个增量值的属性。The UI should scroll the number of logical lines returned by the property for every delta value reached. 您还可以滚动更方便地在较小 120 单位的增量，但是比率应保持不变，即每轮移动的 120 增量单位滚动的行。You can also scroll more smoothly in smaller that 120 unit increments, however the ratio should remain constant, that is lines scrolled per 120 delta units of wheel movement. 有关处理鼠标滚轮消息的详细信息，请参阅[对 wm_mousewheel 进行](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms645617\(v=vs.85\).aspx)主题。For more information about handling mouse wheel messages, see the [WM_MOUSEWHEEL](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms645617\(v=vs.85\).aspx) topic. 鼠标事件按下列顺序发生：Mouse events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. / / 4. 5. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用不同的鼠标事件上绘制的路径鼠标。The following code example demonstrates using different mouse events to draw the path of the mouse on a . 直线段添加到为每个和发生的事件。A line segment is added to the for each and events that occur. 要更新该图形的调用方法每个`MouseDown`和`MouseUp`事件。To update the graphics, the method is called for the on each `MouseDown` and `MouseUp` event. 此外，向上或向下时滚动的图形路径事件发生。In addition, the graphic path is scrolled up or down when the event occurs. 其他鼠标事件，例如，屏幕上进行标识。Additional mouse events, like , are identified on screen as well. 此外在屏幕上显示为鼠标从有关的其他信息类。Also displayed on the screen is additional information about the mouse from the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.MouseEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MouseEvent/CPP/mouseeventexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.MouseEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MouseEvent/CS/mouseeventexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.MouseEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MouseEvent/VB/mouseeventexample.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置控件的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the control.

value.span: 控件的名称。

span.span: The name of the control.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以用于在运行时计算对象的名称而不是类型和编程名称。The property can be used at run time to evaluate the object by name rather than type and programmatic name. 因为属性返回类型，可以在用例样式逻辑语句中对它进行评估 (`Select`在 Visual Basic 中的语句`switch`语句在 Visual C# 和[!INCLUDE[vcprvc](~/includes/vcprvc-md.md)])。Because the property returns a type, it can be evaluated in case-style logic statements (`Select` statement in Visual Basic, `switch` statement in Visual C# and [!INCLUDE[vcprvc](~/includes/vcprvc-md.md)]). ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示中的控件的添加或删除从窗体控件时。The following code example displays the of a control in a when the control is added or removed from a form. [!code-cpp[Control.ControlRemoved#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.ControlRemoved/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control.ControlRemoved#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.ControlRemoved/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control.ControlRemoved#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.ControlRemoved/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

abstract member OnBackColorChanged : EventArgs -> unit override this.OnBackColorChanged : EventArgs -> unit

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是属于引发事件的方法时执行属性值发生更改。The following code example is an event-raising method that is executed when the property value changes. 类的一些方法具有名称模式`On` *PropertyName* `Changed`的引发相应*PropertyName* `Changed`事件时*PropertyName*值发生更改 (*PropertyName*表示相应的属性的名称)。The class has several methods with the name pattern `On`*PropertyName*`Changed` that raise the corresponding *PropertyName*`Changed` event when the *PropertyName* value changes (*PropertyName* represents the name of the corresponding property). 下面的代码示例中更改的派生的类显示货币数据。The following code example changes the of a derived class displaying currency data. 此示例将文本转换为十进制数字，并更改到如果数字为负数和如果数字为正数。The example converts the text to a decimal number and changes the to if the number is negative and to if the number is positive. 此示例需要您有派生一个类类。This example requires that you have a class that derives from the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是属于引发事件的方法时执行属性值发生更改。The following code example is an event-raising method that is executed when the property value changes. 类的一些方法具有名称模式`On` *PropertyName* `Changed`的引发相应*PropertyName* `Changed`事件时*PropertyName*值发生更改 (*PropertyName*表示相应的属性的名称)。The class has several methods with the name pattern `On`*PropertyName*`Changed` that raise the corresponding *PropertyName*`Changed` event when the *PropertyName* value changes (*PropertyName* represents the name of the corresponding property). 下面的代码示例中更改的派生的类显示货币数据。The following code example changes the of a derived class displaying currency data. 此示例将文本转换为十进制数字，并更改到如果数字为负数和如果数字为正数。The example converts the text to a decimal number and changes the to if the number is negative and to if the number is positive. 此示例需要您有派生一个类类。This example requires that you have a class that derives from the class. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents/CPP/onpropertychangedevents.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents/CS/onpropertychangedevents.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents/VB/onpropertychangedevents.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 向控件通知 Windows 消息。

span.span: Notifies the control of Windows messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当调用方法的控件`EnableNotifyMessage`中设置样式位。The method is called if the control's `EnableNotifyMessage` style bit is set in . `EnableNotifyMessage`设置中的样式使得控件可以时得到通知方法接收 Windows 消息。The `EnableNotifyMessage` style in enables the control to be notified when the method receives a Windows message. 使用此方法，可以侦听的 Windows 消息而无需使其能够修改消息不完全受信任的控件。With this method, semi-trusted controls can listen for Windows messages without enabling them to modify the message.

para.span: 重写时派生类中调用基类的方法不必要，因为没有初始实现。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, calling the base class's method is not necessary because there is no initial implementation.

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还可使派生的类处理事件，而不必附加委托。The method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用户将图像或图像文件拖到窗体，并将其显示在其删除的点。The following code example enables the user to drag an image or image file onto the form, and have it be displayed at the point on which it is dropped. 方法被重写重绘每次绘制窗体的图像; 否则该映像将仅持续到下一步重新绘制。The method is overridden to repaint the image each time the form is painted; otherwise the image would only persist until the next repainting. 事件处理方法确定要拖动到窗体数据的类型，并提供适当的反馈。The event-handling method determines the type of data being dragged into the form and provides the appropriate feedback. 事件处理方法在窗体上显示图像，如果可以从数据创建。The event-handling method displays the image on the form, if an can be created from the data. 因为并的值为屏幕坐标，该示例使用方法来将它们转换为客户端坐标。Because the and values are screen coordinates, the example uses the method to convert them to client coordinates. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations/CPP/imagedrag.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations/CS/imagedrag.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations/VB/imagedrag.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[Control.Paint#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Paint/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control.Paint#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Paint/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control.Paint#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Paint/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 当控件容器的 属性值更改时，将引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event when the property value of the control's container changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还可使派生的类处理事件，而不必附加委托。The method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是属于引发事件的方法时执行属性值发生更改。The following code example is an event-raising method that is executed when the property value changes. 类的一些方法具有名称模式`On` *PropertyName* `Changed`的引发相应*PropertyName* `Changed`事件时*PropertyName*值发生更改 (*PropertyName*表示相应的属性的名称)。The class has several methods with the name pattern `On`*PropertyName*`Changed` that raise the corresponding *PropertyName*`Changed` event when the *PropertyName* value changes (*PropertyName* represents the name of the corresponding property). 下面的代码示例中更改的派生的类显示货币数据。The following code example changes the of a derived class displaying currency data. 此示例将文本转换为十进制数字，并更改到如果数字为负数和如果数字为正数。The example converts the text to a decimal number and changes the to if the number is negative and to if the number is positive. 此示例需要您有派生一个类类。This example requires that you have a class that derives from the class. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents/CPP/onpropertychangedevents.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents/CS/onpropertychangedevents.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents/VB/onpropertychangedevents.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还可使派生的类处理事件，而不必附加委托。The method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

para.span: 方法可以调用在构造期间，因此，如果您重写控件构造函数调用之前，可以调用它。

span.span: The method can be called during construction, so if you override it can be called before the control constructor is called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于如容器并，则属性获取或设置其各自属性。For containers such as and , the property gets or sets their respective properties. 属性等于其属性。The property is equal to its property. 控件接收默认值为是合理地接近 Windows 用户界面指南。Controls receive default values for that are reasonably close to Windows user interface guidelines. 一些调整可能仍需要为特定应用程序。Some adjustments might still be necessary for particular applications. 实现的所有控件的量以放大时是`true`。All controls that implement are enlarged by the amount in when is `true`. 以下控件不使用:The following controls do not use : - 控件不实现通过 Controls that do not implement through - 直接从继承的自定义控件 Custom controls that directly inherit from - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含继承的类型的实例的项目，如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后该实例命名`Control1`，并确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 在重绘控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control is redrawn.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重绘该控件时引发事件。The event is raised when the control is redrawn. 它将传递的实例处理的方法为事件。It passes an instance of to the method(s) that handles the event. 创建新的自定义控件或继承的控件具有不同的可视外观时, 必须提供代码来呈现控件通过重写方法。When creating a new custom control or an inherited control with a different visual appearance, you must provide code to render the control by overriding the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[重写 OnPaint 方法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/overriding-the-onpaint-method.md)并[自定义控件的绘制和呈现](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/custom-control-painting-and-rendering.md)。For more information, see [Overriding the OnPaint Method](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/overriding-the-onpaint-method.md) and [Custom Control Painting and Rendering](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/custom-control-painting-and-rendering.md). 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将创建控件在窗体和使用事件以绘制到它。The following code example creates a control on the form and uses the event to draw to it. summary.span: 在 属性值更改时发生。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果引发此事件属性更改通过以编程方式修改或用户交互。This event is raised if the property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例启用删除用户后，将图像或图像文件拖到窗体，并将其显示在其上的点。The following code example enables the user to drag an image or image file onto the form, and have it be displayed at the point on it is dropped. 方法被重写重绘每次绘制窗体的图像; 否则该映像将仅持续到下一步重新绘制。The method is overridden to repaint the image each time the form is painted; otherwise the image would only persist until the next repainting. 事件处理方法确定要拖动到窗体数据的类型，并提供适当的反馈。The event-handling method determines the type of data being dragged into the form and provides the appropriate feedback. 事件处理方法在窗体上显示图像，如果可以从数据创建。The event-handling method displays the image on the form, if an can be created from the data. 因为并的值为屏幕坐标，该示例使用方法来将它们转换为客户端坐标。Because the and values are screen coordinates, the example uses the method to convert them to client coordinates. remarks.format: ## Remarks 由应用程序的消息循环进行预处理输入的消息之前对它们调用。 is called by the application's message loop to preprocess input messages before they are dispatched. 可能值为`msg`参数是 WM_KEYDOWN、 WM_SYSKEYDOWN、 WM_CHAR 和 WM_SYSCHAR。Possible values for the `msg` parameter are WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_CHAR, and WM_SYSCHAR. 重写时，控制应返回`true`以指示它已处理该消息。When overriding , a control should return `true` to indicate that it has processed the message. 对于不处理由控件的结果消息，`base.PreProcessMessage`应返回。For messages that are not processed by the control, the result of `base.PreProcessMessage` should be returned. 控件通常将如覆盖更专用的方法之一， ， ， ，或而不是替代。Controls will typically override one of the more specialized methods such as , , , , or instead of overriding .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event PreviewKeyDown As PreviewKeyDownEventHandler

summary.span: 在焦点位于此控件上的情况下，当有按键动作时发生（在 事件之前发生）。

span.span: Occurs before the event when a key is pressed while focus is on this control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为它们不会被视为输入的按键，某些控件通常会忽略某些按键，例如选项卡、 返回、 ESC、 和箭头键。Some key presses, such as the TAB, RETURN, ESC, and arrow keys, are typically ignored by some controls because they are not considered input key presses. 例如，默认情况下，控件忽略箭头键。For example, by default, a control ignores the arrow keys. 通常按箭头键将导致焦点移动到上一个或下一个控件。Pressing the arrow keys typically causes the focus to move to the previous or next control. 箭头键导航键并按这些键通常不会引发被视为事件。The arrow keys are considered navigation keys and pressing these keys typically do not raise the event for a . 但是，按箭头键会引发事件。However, pressing the arrow keys for a does raise the event. 通过处理事件并设置属性设置为`true`，你可以将提升事件按箭头键时。By handling the event for a and setting the property to `true`, you can raise the event when the arrow keys are pressed. 但是，如果处理箭头键，焦点将无法再移动到上一个或下一个控件。However, if you handle the arrow keys, the focus will no longer move to the previous or next control. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示，其中包含。The following code example demonstrates a that includes a . 当具有焦点并按向上键或向下箭头键，出现。When the has the focus and you press the UP ARROW or DOWN ARROW keys, the appears. 事件处理程序检测到按向上键或向下箭头键时，并设置属性设置为`true`。The event handler detects when the UP ARROW or DOWN ARROW keys are pressed and sets the property to `true`. 这将引发事件，以便可以显示。This raises the event so that you can display the . 您不应该将任何逻辑置于事件处理程序中，除了要设置属性。You should not put any logic in the event handler, other than to set the property. 相反，应将你的逻辑放事件处理程序。Instead, you should put your logic in the event handler. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.windows.forms.control.previewkeydown/cs/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.windows.forms.control.previewkeydown/vb/form1.vb#1)]
