remarks.format: ## Remarks 在消息处理命令键的预处理过程中调用此方法。This method is called during message preprocessing to handle command keys. 命令键是始终优先于常规输入键的键。Command keys are keys that always take precedence over regular input keys. 命令键的示例包括加速器和菜单快捷方式。Examples of command keys include accelerators and menu shortcuts. 该方法必须返回`true`以指示它已处理命令键，或`false`以指示密钥不是命令键。The method must return `true` to indicate that it has processed the command key, or `false` to indicate that the key is not a command key. 当控件承载在 Windows 窗体应用程序或作为 ActiveX 控件时，只能调用此方法。This method is only called when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or as an ActiveX control. 方法首先确定控件是否有，以及如果是这样，启用来处理命令键。The method first determines whether the control has a , and if so, enables the to process the command key. 如果命令键不为菜单快捷方式，该控件具有一个父级，该密钥传递给父级的方法。If the command key is not a menu shortcut and the control has a parent, the key is passed to the parent's method. 实际效果是该密钥"弹出"的控件层次结构的命令。The net effect is that command keys are "bubbled" up the control hierarchy. 用户按下的键，除了密钥数据还指示哪些，如果有，同时按下修改键作为键相同的时间。In addition to the key the user pressed, the key data also indicates which, if any, modifier keys were pressed at the same time as the key. 修改键包括 SHIFT、 CTRL 和 ALT 键。Modifier keys include the SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT keys.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 邮件预处理以处理对话框字符，如控件的助记键时调用此方法。This method is called during message preprocessing to handle dialog characters, such as control mnemonics. 仅当调用此方法方法指示该控件不处理该字符。This method is called only if the method indicates that the control is not processing the character. 方法只需将该字符发送到的父方法或返回`false`如果控件具有没有父级。The method simply sends the character to the parent's method, or returns `false` if the control has no parent. 类重写此方法以执行实际处理对话框字符。The class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog characters. 当控件承载在 Windows 窗体应用程序或作为 ActiveX 控件时，只能调用此方法。This method is only called when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or as an ActiveX control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当一个控件接收键盘消息时，调用此方法。This method is called when a control receives a keyboard message. 该方法首先确定控件是否具有一个父级;如果是，则调用父方法。The method first determines whether the control has a parent; if so, it calls the parent's method. 如果父方法不会处理该消息则调用方法来生成相应的键盘事件。If the parent's method does not process the message then the method is called to generate the appropriate keyboard events. `m`参数包含必须处理的窗口消息。The `m` parameter contains the window message that must be processed. 可能值为属性是 WM_CHAR、 WM_KEYDOWN、 WM_SYSKEYDOWN、 WM_KEYUP 和 WM_SYSKEYUP。Possible values for the property are WM_CHAR, WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_KEYUP, and WM_SYSKEYUP.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当子控件接收键盘消息时，子控件通过调用此方法。This method is called by a child control when the child control receives a keyboard message. 子控件生成的消息的任何键盘事件之前调用此方法。The child control calls this method before generating any keyboard events for the message. 如果此方法返回`true`，子控件将处理的消息，它不生成任何键盘事件。If this method returns `true`, the child control considers the message processed and does not generate any keyboard events. `m`参数包含要预览的窗口消息。The `m` parameter contains the window message to preview. 可能值为属性是 WM_CHAR、 WM_KEYDOWN、 WM_SYSKEYDOWN、 WM_KEYUP 和 WM_SYSKEYUP。Possible values for the property are WM_CHAR, WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_KEYUP, and WM_SYSKEYUP. 方法只需将该字符发送到的父方法或返回`false`如果控件具有没有父级。The method simply sends the character to the parent's method, or returns `false` if the control has no parent. 类重写此方法以执行实际处理对话框键。The class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog keys.

summary.span: 处理助记键字符。

returns.span: 如果字符由控件作为助记键处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the character was processed as a mnemonic by the control; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法以便为控件提供机会处理助记键字符。This method is called to give a control the opportunity to process a mnemonic character. 该方法应确定是否在控件处于处理助记键的状态，是否给定的字符是否表示助记键。The method should determine whether the control is in a state to process mnemonics and if whether the given character represents a mnemonic. 如果通过因此，此方法应执行与助记键并返回关联的操作`true`。If so, the method should perform the action associated with the mnemonic and return `true`. 如果不是，该方法应返回`false`。If not, the method should return `false`. 此方法的实现通常使用方法，以确定给定的字符是否匹配控件的文本中的助记键。Implementations of this method often use the method to determine whether the given character matches a mnemonic in the control's text. 例如:For example: ```csharp if (CanSelect && IsMnemonic(charCode, MyControl.Text) { // Perform action associated with mnemonic. } ``` 此默认实现方法仅返回`false`以指示该控件具有没有助记键。This default implementation of the method simply returns `false` to indicate that the control has no mnemonic. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 button 类的扩展方法以显示自定义行为。The following code example demonstrates an extension of the button class that overrides the method to exhibit custom behavior. 该示例还演示如何使用和属性。The example also demonstrates the use of the and properties. 若要运行此示例中的窗体类，同一文件中后面粘贴以下代码。To run this example paste the following code after a form class, in the same file. 添加的按钮类型的`MnemonicButton`到窗体。Add a button of type `MnemonicButton` to the form. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event QueryAccessibilityHelp As QueryAccessibilityHelpEventHandler

summary.span: 在 为辅助功能应用程序提供帮助时发生。

span.span: Occurs when is providing help to accessibility applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应使用类，以使用户能够通过按 F1 键来调用可访问对象的帮助。You should use the class to enable users to invoke help on your accessible object by pressing the F1 key. 使用中的完整信息为您提供。Using the provides you with complete information in the . 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个具有辅助功能的图表控件，并使用和类，以公开访问的信息。The following code example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 控件绘制图例以及两条曲线。The control plots two curves along with a legend. `ChartControlAccessibleObject`类，该类派生自`ControlAccessibleObject`，在使用方法以提供自定义访问图表控件的信息。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 因为不是实际图表图例-基于控制，但改为绘制由图表控件，它不提供任何内置的可访问信息。Since the chart legend is not an actual -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not any built-in accessible information. 因此，`ChartControlAccessibleObject`类将重写方法以返回`CurveLegendAccessibleObject`，它表示每个部分的图例可访问信息。Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 当辅助功能的应用程序使用该控件时，该控件可以提供所需的可访问信息。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. 这段代码摘录演示了如何处理事件。This code excerpt demonstrates handling the event. 请参阅完整的代码示例的类概述。See the class overview for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CPP/chartcontrol.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CS/chartcontrol.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/VB/chartcontrol.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event QueryContinueDrag As QueryContinueDragEventHandler

summary.span: 在拖放操作期间发生，并且允许拖动源确定是否应取消拖放操作。

span.span: Occurs during a drag-and-drop operation and enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 拖放操作期间键盘或鼠标按钮状态更改时引发事件。The event is raised when there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state during a drag-and-drop operation. 事件允许拖动源确定是否应取消拖放操作。The event enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled. 下面描述与拖放操作相关的事件的引发方式以及引发时间。The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised. 方法确定当前游标位置下的控件。The method determines the control under the current cursor location. 然后检查以查看该控件是否有效的放置目标。It then checks to see if the control is a valid drop target. 如果控件是有效的放置目标，指定的拖放效果引发事件。If the control is a valid drop target, the event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified. 有关拖放效果的列表，请参见 枚举。For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the enumeration. 跟踪鼠标光标位置、键盘状态和鼠标按钮状态的更改。Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked. - 如果用户移出一个窗口，则引发 事件。If the user moves out of a window, the event is raised. - 如果鼠标进入另一个控件，则引发该控件的 。If the mouse enters another control, the for that control is raised. - 如果鼠标移动但停留在同一个控件中，则引发 事件。If the mouse moves but stays within the same control, the event is raised. 如果键盘或鼠标按钮状态，更改事件引发，并确定是否继续拖动、 放置数据，或取消操作值的基础属性的事件的。If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the property of the event's . - 如果的值是`Continue`，则引发事件以继续操作并事件以产生新效果，从而可以设置适当的可视反馈。If the value of is `Continue`, the event is raised to continue the operation and the event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set. 有关有效放置效果的列表，请参见 枚举。For a list of valid drop effects, see the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 和事件成对发生，以便当鼠标移到放置目标时，用户提供的最新反馈有关鼠标的位置。The and events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position. - 如果的值是`Drop`，则放置效果值将返回到源，以便源应用程序可以执行相应的操作对源数据中; 例如，如果则剪切数据是移动操作。If the value of is `Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move. - 如果的值是`Cancel`，则引发事件。If the value of is `Cancel`, the event is raised. 默认情况下事件将设置到`Cancel`中如果按下了 ESC 键，并设置到`Drop`中如果按下鼠标左键、 中间名或右按钮。By default, the event sets to `Cancel` in if the ESC key was pressed and sets to `Drop` in if the left, middle, or right mouse button is pressed. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了两个之间拖放操作控件。The following code example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 此示例调用当拖动操作开始时的方法。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果已移动鼠标拖动操作启动多个鼠标位置在从事件。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用于确定要在拖动的项的索引`MouseDown`事件。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 示例还演示如何使用自定义光标拖放操作。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 该示例需要两个光标文件`3dwarro.cur`和`3dwno.cur`、 存在于应用程序目录，用于自定义拖动和不可拖动光标，分别。The example requires that two cursor files,`3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 如果将使用自定义光标`UseCustomCursorsCheck`检查。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 在中设置自定义光标事件处理程序。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 键盘状态进行评估事件处理程序的权利`ListBox`，以确定拖动操作将为基于 SHIFT、 CTRL、 ALT 或 CTRL + ALT 键的状态。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based on state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 中的位置`ListBox`期间还确定发生下拉`DragOver`事件。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果要删除的数据不是`String`，则设置为`None`中。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to `None` in . 最后，在显示状态的下拉`DropLocationLabel` 。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 若要删除的权利的数据`ListBox`在中确定事件处理程序和`String`值中的适当位置添加`ListBox`。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果拖动操作移动边界以外的窗体，则在取消拖放操作事件处理程序。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 这段代码摘录演示了如何使用事件。This code excerpt demonstrates using the event. 请参阅完整的代码示例的方法。See the method for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#6)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 窗口区域是在其中操作系统允许绘图窗口内的像素为单位的集合。The window region is a collection of pixels within the window where the operating system permits drawing. 操作系统不显示窗口的窗口区域之外的任何部分。The operating system does not display any portion of a window that lies outside of the window region. 控件的坐标是区域的相对于控件不在控件的客户端区域的左上角。The coordinates of a control's region are relative to the upper-left corner of the control, not the client area of the control. > [!NOTE] > 包含与区域的像素集合可以是不连续。The collection of pixels contained with the region can be noncontiguous. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用通过创建圆形按钮的属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property by creating a round button. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴在包含名为的按钮的窗体`roundButton`。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a button called `roundButton`. 此示例需要事件连接到在示例中定义的事件处理程序。This example requires that the event is connected to the event handler defined in the example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要确定调整大小后的控件，可以强制转换`sender`的已注册的参数方法并获取其属性 (或和属性单独）。To determine the of the resized control, you can cast the `sender` parameter of the registered method to a and get its property (or and properties individually). 若要处理自定义布局，请使用而不是调整大小事件的事件。To handle custom layouts, use the event instead of the Resize event. 在响应中引发事件事件，也可以在响应会影响控件的布局的其他更改。The event is raised in response to a event, but also in response to other changes that affect the layout of the control. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例中处理事件的。The following code example handles the event of a . 在窗体的大小调整，事件处理程序将确保窗体仍方形 (其和保持相等)。When the form is resized, the event handler ensures that the form stays square (its and remain equal). 若要运行此示例，请确保并将此事件处理方法与窗体的事件。To run this example, make sure and associate this event-handling method with the form’s event. summary.span: 恢复正常的布局逻辑。

span.span: Resumes usual layout logic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法强制立即进行布局，如果存在任何挂起的布局请求。Calling the method forces an immediate layout if there are any pending layout requests. 并方法将相继配合使用来禁止显示多个事件时调整控件的多个属性。The and methods are used in tandem to suppress multiple events while you adjust multiple attributes of the control. 例如，通常会调用方法，然后设置， ， ，或的控件，然后调用属性方法，以使更改生效。For example, you would typically call the method, then set the , , , or properties of the control, and then call the method to enable the changes to take effect. 必须有未挂起调用为成功调用。There must be no pending calls to for to be successfully called. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将两个按钮添加到窗体。The following code example adds two buttons to a form. 示例事务使用的按钮添加和方法。The example transactions the addition of the buttons by using the and methods. span.span: Resumes usual layout logic, optionally forcing an immediate layout of pending layout requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法强制立即进行布局，如果存在任何挂起的布局请求。Calling the method forces an immediate layout if there are any pending layout requests. 当`performLayout`参数设置为`true`，如果有任何挂起的布局请求，会发生对立即进行布局。When the `performLayout` parameter is set to `true`, an immediate layout occurs if there are any pending layout requests. 并方法将相继配合使用来禁止显示多个事件时调整控件的多个属性。The and methods are used in tandem to suppress multiple events while you adjust multiple attributes of the control. 例如，通常会调用方法，然后设置， ， ，或的控件，然后调用属性方法，以使更改生效。For example, you would typically call the method, then set the , , , or properties of the control, and then call the method to enable the changes to take effect. 必须有未挂起调用为成功调用。There must be no pending calls to for to be successfully called. > [!NOTE] > 当将多个控件添加到父控件，建议您调用方法，然后再初始化要添加的控件。When adding several controls to a parent control, it is recommended that you call the method before initializing the controls to be added. 将控件添加到父控件之后, 调用方法。After adding the controls to the parent control, call the method. 这将提高具有多个控件的应用程序的性能。This will increase the performance of applications with many controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是一个环境属性。The property is an ambient property. 环境属性是控件属性，如果未设置，检索从父控件。An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control. 例如，具有相同作为其父默认情况下。For example, a will have the same as its parent by default. 有关环境属性的详细信息，请参阅类或类概述。For more information about ambient properties, see the class or the class overview. 属性用于国际应用程序语言从右到左，例如希伯来语或阿拉伯语的写入位置。The property is used for international applications where the language is written from right to left, such as Hebrew or Arabic. 当此属性设置为，从右到左显示包含文本的控件元素。When this property is set to , control elements that include text are displayed from right to left. > [!NOTE] > 如果的值在运行时更改属性，仅对不带格式的原始文本时保留。If the value of the property is changed at run time, only raw text without formatting is preserved. 以下是几个示例的控件元素如何受属性值为:The following are a few examples of how control elements are affected by the property value of : - 在左侧而不是可滚动控件的右侧显示垂直滚动条 (例如， ，多行，和)。Vertical scroll bars are displayed on the left side rather than right side of scrollable controls (for example, , , multiline , and ). - 水平滚动条开始右对齐的滚动框 （滚动块）。Horizontal scroll bars start with the scroll box (thumb) right-aligned. - 复选框元素对齐方式，受`CheckAlign`属性，已逆转和控件。The check box element alignment, controlled by the `CheckAlign` property, is reversed for and controls. - 右对齐列表框、 组合框和 up-down 控件中的项。Items in list box, combo box, and up-down controls are right aligned. - 向上和向下按钮为上的左对齐和控件。Up and down buttons are left-aligned on and controls. - 菜单 (， ，和) 右对齐显示。Menus (, , and ) are displayed right-aligned. - 上的工具栏按钮的对齐控件或上文本的对齐方式不会影响属性。The alignment of toolbar buttons on a control or the alignment of text on a is not affected by the property. - 支持从右到左对齐方式;但是，ActiveX 控件上的效果取决于向其控件作者实现对从右到左显示支持的范围。 supports right-to-left alignment; however, the effect on an ActiveX control depends on the extent to which the control author implemented support for right-to-left display.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果引发此事件属性更改通过以编程方式修改或用户交互。This event is raised if the property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个事件处理程序时执行属性值发生更改。The following code example is an event handler that is executed when the property value changes. 类的一些方法具有名称模式*PropertyName* `Changed`的时引发的相应*PropertyName*值发生更改 (*PropertyName*表示相应的属性的名称)。The class has several methods with the name pattern *PropertyName*`Changed` that are raised when the corresponding *PropertyName* value changes (*PropertyName* represents the name of the corresponding property). 下面的代码示例中更改的显示货币数据。The following code example changes the of a displaying currency data. 此示例将文本转换为十进制数字，并更改到如果数字为负数和如果数字为正数。The example converts the text to a decimal number and changes the to if the number is negative and to if the number is positive. 此示例要求具有，其中包含。This example requires that you have a that contains a . remarks.format: ## Remarks `directed`和`forward`参数由容器样式的控件。The `directed` and `forward` parameters are used by container-style controls. 当`directed`参数设置为`true`，则`forward`参数的计算结果来确定哪个控件进行选择。When the `directed` parameter is set to `true`, the `forward` parameter is evaluated to determine which control to select. 时`forward`设置为`true`，在 tab 键顺序中的下一个控件处于选中状态，当`false`，选择上一个控件的 tab 键顺序。When `forward` is set to `true`, the next control in the tab order is selected; when `false`, the previous control in the tab order is selected. 方法激活的控件，如果控件的`Selectable`样式位设置为`true`中、 包含在另一个控件和所有其父控件均可见且已启用。The method activates the control if the control's `Selectable` style bit is set to `true` in , it is contained in another control, and all its parent controls are both visible and enabled. 以下列表中的 Windows 窗体控件不可选择。The Windows Forms controls in the following list are not selectable. 从列表中的控件派生的控件也不会选择。Controls derived from controls in the list will also not be selectable. - - - - - - - （如果没有控件中显示的链接） (when there is no link present in the control)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法激活的 tab 键顺序的下一个控件，如果控件的`Selectable`样式位设置为`true`中、 包含在另一个控件和所有其父控件均可见且已启用。The method activates the next control in the tab order if the control's `Selectable` style bit is set to `true` in , it is contained in another control, and all its parent controls are both visible and enabled. 以下列表中的 Windows 窗体控件不可选择。The Windows Forms controls in the following list are not selectable. 从列表中的控件派生的控件也不会选择。Controls derived from controls in the list will also not be selectable. - - - - - - - （如果没有控件中显示的链接） (when there is no link present in the control) 将焦点更改通过使用键盘 （TAB、 SHIFT + TAB，等），通过调用或方法，或通过设置到当前窗体的属性，将按以下顺序发生焦点事件：When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the or methods, or by setting the property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 如果属性设置为`false`，则和所抑制的事件。If the property is set to `false`, the and events are suppressed. ## Examples 下面的代码 exampleshows中有一些控件的窗体正在使用的方法。The following code exampleshows the method being used in a form that has some controls. 每次单击窗体，而下一个控件被激活。Each time that you click the form, the next control is activated. 属性获取容器控件中当前处于活动状态的控件。The property gets the currently active control in the container control. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.windows.forms.control.selectnextcontrol/cs/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.windows.forms.control.selectnextcontrol/vb/form1.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示方法中具有的窗体正在使用和一些其他控件。The following code example shows the method being used in a form that has a and some other controls. 当您单击之后, 的下一个控件激活。When you click the , the next control after the is activated. 请注意，需要获取的父控件。Notice that you have to get the parent of the control. 由于不是容器，调用是直接在可能不会更改激活。Since is not a container, calling directly on the would not change the activation. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SendToBack() cil managed

summary.span: 将控件发送到 Z 顺序的后面。

span.span: Sends the control to the back of the z-order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将控件移到 z 顺序的后面。The control is moved to the back of the z-order. 如果该控件，另一个控件的子级子控件移到 z 顺序的后面。If the control is a child of another control, the child control is moved to the back of the z-order. 如果该控件为顶级控件，此方法将无法正常工作，除非该控件处于活动状态。If the control is a top-level control, this method will not work correctly unless the control is active. 顶级控件是控件，如，即不是子级的另一个控件。A top-level control is a control, such as a , that is not a child of another control. 活动控件是一个具有输入焦点的可见控件。An active control is a visible control that has input focus. 若要使用方法使用活动的顶级控件，首先调用在控件上的方法。To use the method with an inactive, top-level control, first call the method on the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，对应于不包含在边界参数`specified`使用其当前值传递参数。Typically, the parameters that correspond to the bounds not included in the `specified` parameter are passed in with their current values. 例如， ， ，或或的属性属性可以使用对该控件的当前实例的引用传递。For example, the , , or the or properties of the property can be passed in with a reference to the current instance of the control. 但是遵守并应用于控件中传递的所有值。However all values passed in are honored and applied to the control. `boundsSpecified`参数表示的控件元素更改您的应用程序。The `boundsSpecified` parameter represents the elements of the controls changed by your application. 例如，如果您更改的控件`boundsSpecified`参数值是`Size`的值。For example, if you change the of the control, the `boundsSpecified` parameter value is the `Size` value of . 但是，如果在响应中调整属性设置，`boundsSpecified`参数值是`None`的值。However, if the is adjusted in response to the property being set, the `boundsSpecified` parameter value is the `None` value of . > [!NOTE] > 在 Windows Server 2003 系统的大小受到限制，最大像素宽度和高度的监视器。On Windows Server 2003 systems, the size of a is restricted by the maximum pixel width and height of the monitor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例重写方法，以确保控件保持固定的大小。The following code example overrides the method to ensure that the control remains a fixed size. 此示例要求有直接或间接派生自的类类。This example requires that you have a class that is either directly or indirectly derived from the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为类是值类型 (`Structure`在 Visual Basic 中`struct`Visual C# 中)，它返回的值，这意味着访问的属性返回的控件大小的副本。Because the class is a value type (`Structure` in Visual Basic, `struct` in Visual C#), it is returned by value, meaning accessing the property returns a copy of the size of the control. 因此，调整或的属性返回此属性将不会影响或的控件。So, adjusting the or properties of the returned from this property will not affect the or of the control. 若要调整或控件，必须设置控件的或属性或一组具有一个新属性。To adjust the or of the control, you must set the control's or property, or set the property with a new . > [!NOTE] > 若要维护更好的性能，不设置的其构造函数中的控件。To maintain better performance, do not set the of a control in its constructor. 首选的方法是重写属性。The preferred method is to override the property. > [!NOTE] > 在 Windows Server 2003 系统的大小受到限制，最大像素宽度和高度的监视器。On Windows Server 2003 systems, the size of a is restricted by the maximum pixel width and height of the monitor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例添加向窗体，并设置它的一些常见属性。The following code example adds a to a form and sets some of its common properties. 示例定位到窗体右下角的按钮，以便在调整窗体大小时，它使其相对位置。The example anchors the button to the bottom-right corner of the form so it keeps its relative position as the form is resized. 接下来设置调整大小的按钮为具有相同的大小和。Next it sets the and resizes the button to the same size as the . 该示例然后设置到`true`，并设置属性。The example then sets the to `true` and sets the property. 最后，它将添加一个事件处理程序以处理按钮的事件。Lastly, it adds an event handler to handle the event of the button. 此示例要求具有名为`imageList1`。This example requires that you have an named `imageList1`. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CPP/controlproperties.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CS/controlproperties.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/VB/controlproperties.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event SizeChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 在 属性值更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the property value changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最好使用事件来处理自定义布局。It is preferable to use the event to handle custom layouts. 在响应中引发事件事件，而且还在其他情况时可能需要应用布局。The event is raised in response to events, but also in other conditions when layout might need to be applied. 如果引发此事件属性更改通过以编程方式修改或用户交互。This event is raised if the property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了事件。The following code example demonstrates the event. 实例控件已经被提供的水平和垂直两个可以进行缩放。An instance of a control has been provided that can be scaled both horizontally and vertically. 一个实例提供了水平和垂直缩放值。A instance provides the horizontal and vertical scale value. 名为实例**确定**用于设置的缩放值控件实例。The instance named **OK** is used to set the scale values for the control instance. 每当控件的大小更改时，与关联的事件处理程序调用控件的事件。Whenever the size of the control changes, the event handler associated with the event of the control is called. 此事件处理程序会显示一个消息框，表明该控件的大小已更改。This event handler displays a message box indicating that the size of the control has changed. [!code-cpp[Control_Scale1#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control_Scale1/CPP/control_scale1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Control_Scale1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control_Scale1/CS/control_scale1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Control_Scale1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control_Scale1/VB/control_scale1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 在控件样式更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control style changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生时标志已添加或更改。The event occurs when flags have been added or changed. 如果控件样式更改通过以编程方式修改或用户交互，引发此事件。This event is raised if the control style is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含继承的类型的实例的项目，如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后该实例命名`Control1`，并确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 临时挂起控件的布局逻辑。

span.span: Temporarily suspends the layout logic for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件的布局逻辑被挂起，直到调用方法。The layout logic of the control is suspended until the method is called. 并方法将相继配合使用来禁止显示多个事件时调整控件的多个属性。The and methods are used in tandem to suppress multiple events while you adjust multiple attributes of the control. 例如，通常会调用方法，然后设置， ， ，或的控件，然后调用属性方法，以使更改生效。For example, you would typically call the method, then set the , , , or properties of the control, and then call the method to enable the changes to take effect. 必须有未挂起调用为成功调用。There must be no pending calls to for to be successfully called. > [!NOTE] > 当将多个控件添加到父控件，建议您调用方法，然后再初始化要添加的控件。When adding several controls to a parent control, it is recommended that you call the method before initializing the controls to be added. 将控件添加到父控件之后, 调用方法。After adding the controls to the parent control, call the method. 这将提高具有多个控件的应用程序的性能。This will increase the performance of applications with many controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将两个按钮添加到窗体。The following code example adds two buttons to a form. 示例事务使用的按钮添加和方法。The example transactions the addition of the buttons by using the and methods. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果引发此事件更改通过以编程方式修改或用户交互。This event is raised if the is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含继承的类型的实例的项目，如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后该实例命名`Control1`，并确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 获取或设置控件在其容器内的 Tab 键顺序。

span.span: Gets or sets the tab order of the control within its container.

value.span: 控件容器中控件集合内的控件的索引值。

span.span: The index value of the control within the set of controls within its container.

value.span: 容器中包括的控件以 Tab 键顺序排列。

span.span: The controls in the container are included in the tab order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 选项卡索引可以包含任何有效的整数大于或等于零，较低的数字前的 tab 键顺序。A tab index can consist of any valid integer greater than or equal to zero, lower numbers being earlier in the tab order. 如果在同一个父控件上的多个控件具有相同的选项卡索引，控件的 z 顺序确定在控件间循环切换顺序。If more than one control on the same parent control has the same tab index, the z-order of the controls determines the order to cycle through the controls. 要包含在 tab 键顺序中的控件及其属性必须设置为`true`。For a control to be included in the tab order, its property must be set to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例添加向窗体，并设置它的一些常见属性。The following code example adds a to a form and sets some of its common properties. 示例定位到窗体右下角的按钮，以便在调整窗体大小时，它使其相对位置。The example anchors the button to the bottom-right corner of the form so it keeps its relative position as the form is resized. 接下来设置调整大小的按钮为具有相同的大小和。Next it sets the and resizes the button to the same size as the . 该示例然后设置到`true`，并设置属性。The example then sets the to `true` and sets the property. 最后，它将添加一个事件处理程序以处理按钮的事件。Lastly, it adds an event handler to handle the event of the button. 此示例要求具有名为`imageList1`。This example requires that you have an named `imageList1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 从派生的任何类型类可以分配给此属性。Any type derived from the class can be assigned to this property. 如果通过 Windows 窗体设计器设置属性，可分配纯文本。If the property is set through the Windows Forms designer, only text can be assigned. 一个常见用途属性是与该控件密切相关联的数据存储。A common use for the property is to store data that is closely associated with the control. 例如，如果您有一个控件，显示有关客户的信息，你可能会存储，其中包含该控件中的客户的订单历史记录属性，以便可以快速访问这些数据。For example, if you have a control that displays information about a customer, you might store a that contains the customer's order history in that control's property so the data can be accessed quickly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示一个窗体，并将存储`Customer`在其属性。The following code example displays a form and stores a `Customer` in its property. 此示例需要您定义了派生的类名为`CustomerForm`和已定义的`Customer`。This example requires that you have defined a class that derives from named `CustomerForm` and that you have defined a `Customer`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个派生类以不同的方式使用该控件的属性。The property of the control is used differently by each derived class. 例如属性的显示在窗体顶部的标题栏中，字符数，在很小，通常显示的应用程序或文档的名称。For example the property of a is displayed in the title bar at the top of the form, is fairly small in character count, and usually displays the application or document name. 但是，属性的可以很大，并且可以包含大量用于设置文本格式的不可见字符。However, the property of a can be large and can include numerous nonvisual characters used to format the text. 例如，在显示的文本可通过调整格式设置属性，或通过添加空格或制表符来对齐文本。For example, the text displayed in a can be formatted by adjusting the properties, or by the addition of spaces or tab characters to align the text. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建和设置的某些常见属性。The following code example creates a and sets some of its common properties. 此示例将创建，并设置其组框中。The example creates a and sets its within the group box. 接下来，设置停靠此分组框到窗体顶部的分组框的属性。Next, it sets the property of the group box, and docks the group box to the top of the form. 最后，通过设置禁用分组框属性设置为`false`，这将导致要禁用的组框中包含的所有控件。Lastly, it disables the group box by setting the property to `false`, which causes all controls contained within the group box to be disabled. span.span: Causes the control to redraw the invalidated regions within its client area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 执行用于绘制任何挂起的请求。Executes any pending requests for painting. 有两种方法重新绘制窗体及其内容：There are two ways to repaint a form and its contents: - 可以使用的重载之一方法替换方法。You can use one of the overloads of the method with the method. - 您可以调用方法，这会强制控件重绘本身及其所有子级。You can call the method, which forces the control to redraw itself and all its children. 这相当于设置方法`true`并将其与。This is equivalent to setting the method to `true` and using it with . 方法控制什么获取绘制或重新绘制。The method governs what gets painted or repainted. 方法控制何时进行绘制或重绘。The method governs when the painting or repainting occurs. 如果您使用并方法一起使用，而不是调用，绘制的内容取决于哪个重载你使用。If you use the and methods together rather than calling , what gets repainted depends on which overload of you use. 方法只强制执行立即要绘制的控件，但方法控制所绘制的调用时方法。The method just forces the control to be painted immediately, but the method governs what gets painted when you call the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[WM_PAINT](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd145213\(v=vs.85\).aspx)主题。For more information, see the [WM_PAINT](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd145213\(v=vs.85\).aspx) topic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法调用方法以获取要应用的样式。This method calls the method to get the styles to apply. 分配给样式并的属性分配给控件的属性都将重新应用。The styles assigned to the and properties of the assigned to the control's property are reapplied. 重新绘制控件以反映样式发生改变，如有必要。The control is repainted to reflect the style changes if necessary. 方法不起如果属性值是`false`。The method has no effect if the property value is `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例启用双缓冲上并更新以反映所做的更改的样式。The following code example enables double-buffering on a and updates the styles to reflect the changes. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法会更新其父控件的 z 顺序中控件的位置。The method updates the position of the control in its parent control's z-order. 例如，如果此控件是新创建的控件已添加到，z 顺序更新与新控件添加到背面。For example, if this control is a newly created control that was added to a , the z-order is updated with the new control added to the back.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只要执行的操作所花费的时间明显长，请使用等待光标。但请注意阻塞 UI 线程的操作也会阻止 acursor 更改。因此，仅应在另一个线程中执行耗时的操作时使用此属性。Use a wait cursor whenever you perform an operation that takes a noticeable amount of time.However, note that operations that block the UI thread will also block acursor change.Therefore, this property should only be used when performing time-consuming operations in another thread. 若要在全局级别并立即更改光标，请参阅属性。To change the cursor globally and immediately, seethe property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将焦点更改通过使用键盘 （TAB、 SHIFT + TAB，等），通过调用或方法，或通过设置到当前窗体的属性，将按以下顺序发生焦点事件：When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the or methods, or by setting the property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 当更改焦点，使用鼠标或通过调用方法时，按以下顺序执行的焦点事件：When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the method, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 如果属性设置为`false`，则和所抑制的事件。If the property is set to `false`, the and events are suppressed. 如果的属性设置为`true`中事件委托，通常会发生后的所有事件所抑制的事件。If the property of the is set to `true` in the event delegate, all events that would usually occur after the event are suppressed. > [!CAUTION] > 不尝试将焦点设置在， ， ， ， ，或事件处理程序。Do not attempt to set focus from within the , , , , , or event handlers. 执行此操作可能会导致你的应用程序或操作系统停止响应。Doing so can cause your application or the operating system to stop responding. 有关详细信息，请参阅[WM_KILLFOCUS](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms632614\(v=vs.85\).aspx)主题中和的"消息死锁"一节[有关消息和消息队列](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms644927\(v=vs.85\).aspx)主题。For more information, see the [WM_KILLFOCUS](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms632614\(v=vs.85\).aspx) topic, and the "Message Deadlocks" section of the [About Messages and Message Queues](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms644927\(v=vs.85\).aspx) topic. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生的类并验证用户输入的电子邮件地址。The following code example uses the derived class and validates an email address that the user enters. 如果电子邮件地址不是标准格式 (包含"@" and "。")，则验证将失败，图标会显示，并且取消了该事件。If the email address is not in the standard format (containing "@" and "."), the validation fails, an icon is displayed, and the event is canceled. 此示例需要和已在窗体上创建控件。This example requires that a and control have been created on a form. summary.span: 处理 Windows 消息。

span.span: Processes Windows messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有消息都发送到方法通过进行筛选后的方法。All messages are sent to the method after getting filtered through the method. 方法与 Windows `WindowProc` 函数完全对应。The method corresponds exactly to the Windows `WindowProc` function. 有关处理 Windows 消息的详细信息，请参阅[WindowProc 函数](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=181565)。For more information about processing Windows messages, see the [WindowProc function](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=181565). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法以处理操作系统消息中标识结构。The following code example demonstrates overriding the method to handle operating system messages identified in the structure. [WM_ACTIVATEAPP](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms632614\(v=vs.85\).aspx)操作系统消息处理在此示例中了解当另一个应用程序将变为活动状态。The [WM_ACTIVATEAPP](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms632614\(v=vs.85\).aspx) operating system message is handled in this example to know when another application is becoming active. 请参阅以下主题以了解可用， ，和值。See the following topics to understand the available , , and values. 可以在 Windows.h 标头文件中找到实际的常量值。Actual constant values can be found in the Windows.h header file.
